# isExecuting

**Instance Property**

The execution status of the action set.

## Declaration

```swift
var isExecuting: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] while executing, otherwise [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Keeping track of execution

- **lastExecutionDate**: The last execution date of the action set.
